snippet: Advertising revenue was flat, but content licensing grew thanks to the sale of shows such as “Hawaii Five-O” for domestic reruns.
abstract: CBS reports fourth-quarter profit of $470 million, or 76 cent a share, from $393 million, or 60 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 6 percent to $3.91 billion.
lead_paragraph: Advertising revenue was flat, but content licensing grew thanks to the sale of shows such as “Hawaii Five-O” for domestic reruns.

headline.main: CBS Beats Expectations Despite Flat Ad Revenue
headline.print_headline: CBS Beats Expectations Despite Flat Ad Revenue
